channel.title: Your RSS Feed Title
channel.description: A brief description of your RSS feed.

item.title: Blog Up And Running
item.description:
Hey there, so now my blog is finally up and running (upto the point where I wanted it to be as of now.) Its nothing too fancy, but it does the job hopefully. I will keep updating the blog and will keep adding more to it. Currently I think that a list of the most recent posts on the front page would be something cool to have.
The blog is techincally just some HTML files that are updated by a small shell script named lb by luke smith (lukesmith.xyz). Its a very simple setup which gets the job done, I keep the blog files on my computer and then when I like to post something new I use the lb shell script to create the new post which then is automatically appended to the blog's files by the lb script. Afterwards I add the edited files to the repository and commit it to the main branch to finally add the changes to my github pages website. I shall now port the contents of my older blog to this new blog on my own website.

item.title: NEW POST! NOW USING NANO AS A EDITIOR
item.description: Okay from now on I will be using nano as a text editor. And that's pretty much all that I have to say. I fixed a lot of the HTML, copied some more from some more webpages. And now this is actually getting somewhere hopefully.

item.title: Test Post: My first post using lb
item.description: Hello this is my first post using lb, so It uses vim apparently. Nimbu ki shakti. Oh god I dont know how to save a file in vim. kya hoga ab mera. saale padh le jee ke liye.
